text: The Last Boy Scout is a 1991 American action crime thriller movie. Damon Wayans plays Jimmy Dix. Bruce Willis plays Joe. Halle Berry plays Cory. Danielle Harris plays Darian. This movie was released on December 13, 1991. It got mixed reviews from critics. == Release Dates == Country Premiere 13 December 1991 21 December 1991 24 December 1991 10 January 1992 7 February 1992 12 February 1992 14 February 1992 20 February 1992 28 February 1992 28 February 1992 29 February 1992 6 March 1992 12 March 1992 20 March 1992 27 March 1992 27 March 1992 23 April 1992 24 April 1992 7 May 1992 8 May 1992 22 May 1992 29 May 1992 12 June 1992 12 February 1993 == Other websites == * * Category:1991 action movies Category:1990s action thriller movies Category:1990s buddy movies Category:1991 crime thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:American buddy movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies about abduction Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies about murderers Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Tony Scott
